thread.title: This Baby Elephant Just Started Water Therapy Her Injured Foot Oh My
thread.title_full: This Baby Elephant Just Started Water Therapy For Her Injured Foot And Oh My

author: Jason Wells
title: This Baby Elephant Just Started Water Therapy Her Injured Foot Oh My
text:
View this image ›
Athit Perawongmetha / Reuters
ID: 10275689 She has since been outfitted with a special foot brace to help learn to walk with her disfigured foot. But on Thursday, she also started her hydrotherapy treatment as part of a lengthy rehabilitation process at a facility in Pattaya. ID: 10275701 View this image ›
Athit Perawongmetha / Reuters
ID: 10275702 And stole everyone’s heart in the process. ID: 10275705 View this image ›
Euronews / Via youtube.com
ID: 10275706 The hydrotherapy is supposed to help Fah Jam exercise her bicep muscles since she has been refusing to stand on all four legs, Reuters reported. She looked really into it. ID: 10275711 View this image ›
Athit Perawongmetha / Reuters
ID: 10275712 The animal snare was set by villagers to prevent elephant intrusions in Chanthaburi province, but caregivers hope to one day have her up and walking unaided by a special harness. ID: 10275714 View this image ›
Euronews / Via youtube.com
ID: 10275719 Only time will tell if the treatment works. ID: 10275720 View this image ›
Athit Perawongmetha / Reuters
ID: 10275725 Get on, get on, little Fah Jam. ID: 10275729 View this image ›
Athit Perawongmetha / Reuters
ID: 10275731 Watch her first day in the water here: ID: 10275735 //youtube.com/watch?v=dTYcLtV4AaE . youtube.com
